settings.html: This is The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 Mobile Workstation—an exemplary mobile PACS workstation crafted for the precision and efficiency demands of the medical field, particularly suited for radiologists. This workstation combines robust processing power, advanced graphics, and high-speed storage in a sleek, durable package designed to handle the rigors of healthcare environments.

settings.title: Unparalleled Performance
settings.content: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 delivers robust performance, ensuring radiologists can handle extensive medical imaging workloads with ease. Its advanced processors and high-speed memory allow for rapid processing of complex diagnostic images. With the ability to manage large datasets and run multiple demanding applications simultaneously, this workstation is an ideal choice for high-stakes medical environments where precision and efficiency are paramount. The ZBook Fury 16 G9 also offers exceptional reliability and durability, making it a trusted tool for professionals who require consistent, top-tier performance under pressure.

settings.title: Optimized Viewing for Diagnostic Imaging
settings.content:
The 16:10 aspect ratio of the HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 Mobile Radiology Workstation provides 11% more vertical content than a standard 16:9 display, essential for radiologists who need to view more of the image with less scrolling. This improvement helps maintain diagnostic integrity by ensuring vital details are always visible, reducing the need to minimize program menus or toolbars.

The pixel density on the 16-inch WQUXGA display also surpasses that of a typical 17-inch screen, delivering sharper, more detailed images crucial for accurate diagnosis and analysis.

Key Benefits:

  • Enhanced Vertical Space: Shows more vertical content, ideal for detailed diagnostic images.
  • Improved Workflow: Reduces scrolling, allowing radiologists to focus on image analysis.
  • Comprehensive Image Display: Ensures critical details are visible simultaneously.
  • Higher Pixel Density: Offers superior image clarity compared to a 17-inch display, enhancing diagnostic accuracy.

settings.title: PerfectLUM
settings.content: PerfectLum is specifically designed to optimize the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9’s 4K display, ensuring compliance with medical imaging standards such as DICOM for grayscale accuracy. Its calibration capabilities extend to maintaining the 100% DCI-P3 color gamut offered by the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9, essential for precise radiological diagnostics.

settings.title: Processor
settings.content: This mobile workstation is equipped with the 12th Generation Intel® Core™ processors, including options up to an i9 configuration, which feature up to 14 cores. This powerful multi-core setup enables the workstation to handle multiple complex tasks simultaneously, such as running advanced imaging software, processing large sets of patient data, and supporting real-time collaboration with other medical professionals. The high core count is particularly beneficial for tasks that benefit from parallel processing, such as image rendering and complex simulations used in diagnostic procedures.

settings.title: Graphic Card
settings.content:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 comes equipped with a versatile range of graphics options, tailored to meet the diagnostic needs of radiologists who require precision and detail in medical imaging. The workstation offers integrated Intel® Iris® Xᵉ Graphics for standard visual tasks and a series of high-performance NVIDIA GPUs to handle more demanding imaging applications:

  • NVIDIA RTX™ A1000 (4GB GDDR6): Suitable for moderate imaging tasks.
  • NVIDIA RTX™ A2000 (8GB GDDR6): Provides enhanced capabilities for detailed scans and 3D modeling.
  • NVIDIA RTX™ A3000 (12GB GDDR6): Ideal for advanced diagnostic imaging and virtual simulations.
  • NVIDIA RTX™ A4500 (16GB GDDR6): Supports high-resolution, multi-frame radiographs and complex reconstructions.
  • NVIDIA RTX™ A5500 (16GB GDDR6): Offers top-tier performance for AI-enhanced imaging and large data set processing.
  • NVIDIA GeForce 3060 Laptop GPU (6GB GDDR6): Delivers robust performance for a broad range of imaging applications, from detailed MRIs to complex vascular studies, balancing high performance with power efficiency.
  • NVIDIA GeForce 3070 Ti Laptop GPU (8GB GDDR6): Excels in rendering detailed medical visuals and is especially adept at handling dynamic or time-based imaging like fluoroscopy, providing a smooth and detailed viewing experience.
  • NVIDIA GeForce 3080 Ti Laptop GPU (16GB GDDR6): Best for radiologists seeking ultra-high resolution and rapid processing speeds for dynamic imaging, including real-time image processing and advanced 3D reconstruction tasks.

These GPUs support advanced visual tasks required in radiology, including high-definition decoding and DirectX 12, and are capable of managing multiple high-resolution displays when connected via HP Thunderbolt Dock G2. This is essential for radiologists who require precision in viewing diagnostic images across several monitors. The ECC feature in the higher-end RTX models further ensures data integrity, which is crucial for maintaining accuracy in diagnoses. With this comprehensive GPU setup, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is equipped to meet the demanding and precision-critical needs of modern radiological practices.

settings.title: SSD
settings.content: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 offers storage configurations up to 12TB NVMe SSD, providing lightning-fast data access and ample space for large medical imaging files and extensive patient records. The high-speed SSD technology ensures quick boot times and rapid file transfers, which are crucial for maintaining workflow efficiency in medical settings. This robust storage solution allows healthcare professionals to access and process large datasets swiftly, enabling timely and accurate diagnostics.

settings.title: High-Velocity DDR5 Memory
settings.content: With support for up to 128GB DDR5-4800 RAM, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 offers rapid data access and high bandwidth necessary for managing large imaging files and extensive medical records. This ensures that healthcare professionals can work efficiently without experiencing lag or delays.

settings.title: Experience Enhanced Cooling Efficiency
settings.content: HP Vaporforce Thermals ensure the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 remains cool under heavy computational loads. This advanced cooling system is crucial for maintaining reliable performance during critical diagnostic procedures, preventing overheating and ensuring system stability.

settings.title: Advanced Camera Security
settings.content: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 features a high-definition 720p IR camera with privacy enhancements, such as a physical camera shutter and facial recognition through Windows Hello. Additionally, the integrated fingerprint scanner provides secure and quick access to the workstation, ensuring that sensitive patient data remains protected.

settings.title: Ports
settings.content:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 offers versatile connectivity options with multiple Thunderbolt 4 ports, USB-C, HDMI, and an SD card reader. These ports ensure seamless integration with various medical imaging equipment and peripherals, enhancing the workstation's utility in diverse medical settings.

01. Power Connector
02. Thunderbolt 4 with USB4 Type-C
03. Thunderbolt 4 with USB4 Type-C
04. mDP port
05. HDMI port
06. SD 7.0 Card Reader
07. SmartCard Reader
08. Headphone/Microphone combo
09. 1 Super Speed USB Type-A 5Gbps
10. 1 Super Speed USB Type-A 5Gbps
11. RJ45
12. Nano Security Lock Slot

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.content: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9's sleek design, measuring 14.29 x 9.52 x 1.12 inches and weighing starting at 5.27 lbs, is highly portable for healthcare professionals on the move. Its compact form factor does not compromise on performance, making it a perfect companion for mobile medical applications.
